patthana17.24:1.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.24:2.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.24:3.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.24:4.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
